p:
The title compound was prepared using the procedure described in Example 2, Step 2 replacing 2,5 dichlorobenzylamine with 1-(2,3-dihydro-1H-inden-1-yl)methanamine.
1H NMR (d 6DMSO, 400MHz) δ 9.42 (1H, m), 9.17 (1H, d, J=4.1 Hz), 8.92 (1H, s), 8.61 (1H, d, J=8.3Hz), 7.84 (1H, dd, J=8.3 and 4.1 Hz), 7.40-7.10 (4H, m), 3.80-3.30 (3H,m), 3.05-2.70 (2H, m), 2.30-2.10 (1H, m) and 2.00-1.80 (1H, m) ppm.
FAB MS calcd for C 19H 17N 3O 2 320(MH +), found 320.
FAB HRMS exact mass calcd for C 19H 17N 3O 2 320.1394 (MH +), found 320.1393.
